https://lih.kg/2291367
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
岩岩上網睇過，你有visa，做一年嘢，都只係攞到佢地嘅綠卡，依張綠卡要每5年續一次，續嘅要求係5年有2年住加拿大，唔夠就無咗個身份。所以要入藉，入藉要求你5年內有3年，我無理解錯？

quote.msg: 讀個dioploma好似抵屌過master

replies.msg:
根據加拿大移民法，永久居民住滿1095天（3年），通過語言要求和入籍考試後，可申請入加籍，而獲得永居資格前以工作簽證在加居留的期限也可計算一半時間（半年）。換言之，港人若循此途徑移民加拿大，最快3年半即可申請入籍。

https://simard.com.hk/zh-hant/requirements-for-maintaining-permanent-resident-status-in-canada/

可唔可以講下喺邊度睇
Good- Eliminate 'Astronaut"
It is your personal opinion or this policy really exist?

replies.msg:
Canada has too many fucking "Astronauts"
They dropped off their families here and sucked up all the benefits but did not report their "world wide income'. These are tax cheaters and blood suckers. Many "astronaut" families report minimal interest income that was less than the property taxes on their houses.
There are "net-worth " assessments to catch these tax cheaters.. but hard to catch them all.
.
Many wives of "astronauts' has "boy friends/ SP". (good for them)
Many just left their kids here with "legal guardian" (grand parents or relatives) and some of these kids are trouble makers at schools.

I welcome immigrants (yellow only) who really want to settle in Canada.
I am also oppose to the idea of "non-resident" for tax purposes. Canada is tax by "residency". USA is tax by citizenship and residency. You must file a USA tax return if you are an USA citizen or have "green card". Canada does not require citizen who is not a resident of Canada to file a tax returns(with some exceptions). That is why there are so many Canadian citizens in HK. They returned to HK after they became citizen.

You have to be here to get used to Canadian culture. You may not be able to find jobs in your area of studies/expertise etc.

There will be a lot things waiting for you to be 'worried" about. If you think staying in HK is better than taking all these risks and challenges , then I suggestion you not to come here.
You must psychologically prepared yourself for
破釜沉舟.....

quote.msg:

There will be a lot things waiting for you to be 'worried" about. If you think staying in HK is better than taking all these risks and challenges , then I suggestion you not to come here.
You must psychologically prepared yourself for

pinned.msg:
其實大家唔洗成日諗讀個master就走到，
1，貴，對窮撚黎講唔係一筆細數目
2，要時間又燒錢，讀幾耐就要幾多錢
3，好難入架，加拿大master收人世界數一數二難，大學過3.6先有希望
4，要求同本科relevent先比你讀到，如果你係讀文科，想黎讀computer science勸你不如唔好曬氣
各位同我一樣身無分文既朋友不妨諗下點搵食好過啦，讀完master都要搵到工先係到搵到食，不如直接黎搵工好過啦，想做啲專業既野，可以黎讀好似IVE咁既技術學校
同埋最好考埋車牌過黎用2個月考埋個高速公路試好過等多一年半載
by 我老華僑親戚
